name: Introduction to Physics
description: This course covers the basic principles of physics, covering topics in mechanics, thermodynamics, and electricity and magnetism.

name: Intermediate Physics
description: This course builds on the knowledge acquired in Introduction to Physics and covers topics in classical mechanics, optics, and waves.

name: Advanced Physics
description: This course builds on the knowledge acquired in Intermediate Physics and covers topics such as electromagnetism, quantum mechanics, and relativity.

name: Plasma Physics
description: This course covers the fundamentals of plasma physics, including topics in magnetohydrodynamics, plasma waves and instabilities, and particle acceleration.
